As a keychain: A small charm or a piece of string can be attached to the handle of the spoon to create a unique keychain.
As a desk organizer: The spoon can be used to hold small stationery items like pens, paper clips, or rubber bands.
As a bookend: A group of spoons can be used to hold books upright on a bookshelf.
As a wind chime: A spoon can be used to create a small wind chime by attaching it to a metal ring or a piece of string.
As a bird feeder: A spoon can be used to hold birdseed or small treats for birds to eat.
